name: Threeballin
description:
Threeballin is a quirky combination of relaxing puzzles and arcady high-score chasing! Navigate eight different levels, trying to launch as many balls as possible without running into them! 

- Self-directed puzzles with multiple creative solutions!

- Very squishy aesthetic!

- Made in 1 week for Lost Relic Game Jam

Controls:

Arrows/WASD to move, R to reload level
